name: thedailybeast
text:
A Michigan teen spent weeks in a juvenile detention facility amid the coronavirus pandemic... because she failed to turn in her homework.

Now the teen has been released after an appeals court overruled her initial sentence. https://t.co/WcY5vjlBjD

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @MarlowNYC: Since Scientology is in the news, should be noted that Trump also has curious ties to Scientology, from donating to their orgs, to having Joy Villa serve on his campaign, to granting them PPE loans, to hosting big-name Scientologists at the White House... https://t.co/M3yJUROxSY
